>Maybe, it's a stupid idea but I would be glad to see the inheritance at least in a comment so we can know from >which class it inherits. It's very hard to know the location of a specific method when we don't know ActiveRecord >internals.


Makes sense. As per @rafaelfranca's suggestion, the new change does keep inheritance info intact. 

>Also, sorry, this off of the topic but could please explain why is it important to get this adapter working with JRuby ? >Do'nt JRuby users rely on ar-jdbcpostgresql-adapter ?


you are Correct but without this; test's don't run on JRuby. so, this PR is the part of attempt to get the rails test suite running on Jruby. With each PR, We are taking baby steps in that that direction.  see, #11700
